page.title: 14SCHOOL PRODUCTIONS
page.content: Kerrie has written about her favourite school production. "We take part in many school assemblies and Christmas plays during the year. The teacher choses a theme and then we make up a play, sing songs and play instruments. We also wear costumes. We usually do the play for the rest of the school and for our parents. My favourite production was a play that we did in the Drama Club. This club takes place after school is over and we stay to practise our play. The play was called 'Micro-Quest'. All the characters in the play had the names of Computer words, e.g., Qwerty and Brothers Dim. We sang many songs in the play. We showed the play to the rest of the school and then we performed the play at a nearby club.
